The video was posted on YouTube on Febru: 2021 and has been viewed more than 150,000 times.
The video: s title claims that the renaming of NAIA to Manila International Airport has been approved, with the subtitle mentioning Noynoy Aquino in tears.
NAIA was originally named after former P: Ninoy" Aquino Jr., who was assassinated at the airport in 1983. The nickname "Noynoy" is associated with Aquino Jr.'s son, Benigno Aquino III, who served as Philippine president from 2010 to 2016.
The video includes comments from YouTube: indicating a political rivalry between the two.
